ColorUtilities¶

class colorconverters.ColorUtilities(enable_experimental_features)¶

The color utilities handling all the color utilities.

Parameters

enable_experimental_features (bool) – Whether to enable experimental features (alpha and beta features).

color_to_hex()¶

Converts a specified color to an equivalent hex.

Parameters

color (str) – The color to be converted to hex.

Returns

An equivalent hex of the specified color.

Return type

str

hex_to_color()¶

Converts a specified hex to an equivalent color.

Parameters

hex (str) – The hex to be converted to color.

Returns

An equivalent color of the specified hex.

Return type

str
